TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EncoderParameterValueType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Used to specify the data type of the used with the or method of an image.

remarks.format:
## Remarks GDI+ uses image encoders to convert the images stored in <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> objects to various file formats. Image encoders are built into GDI+ for the BMP, JPEG, GIF, TIFF, and PNG formats. An encoder is invoked when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SaveAdd%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> object.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter.NumberOfValues%2A> data member of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter> object indicates the length of the character string including the `null` terminator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameterValueType ValueTypeAscii = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the array of values is a null-terminated ASCII character string. Note that the data member of the object indicates the length of the character string including the NULL terminator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameterValueType ValueTypeByte = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that each value in the array is an 8-bit unsigned integer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameterValueType ValueTypeLong = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies that each value in the array is a 32-bit unsigned integer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameterValueType ValueTypeLongRange = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Specifies that each value in the array is a pair of 32-bit unsigned integers. Each pair represents a range of numbers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameterValueType ValueTypeRational = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Specifies that each value in the array is a pair of 32-bit unsigned integers. Each pair represents a fraction, the first integer being the numerator and the second integer being the denominator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameterValueType ValueTypeRationalRange = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Specifies that each value in the array is a set of four, 32-bit unsigned integers. The first two integers represent one fraction, and the second two integers represent a second fraction. The two fractions represent a range of rational numbers. The first fraction is the smallest rational number in the range, and the second fraction is the largest rational number in the range.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameterValueType ValueTypeShort = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies that each value in the array is a 16-bit, unsigned integer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameterValueType ValueTypeUndefined = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the array of values is an array of bytes that has no data type defined.
